articles.description: There are 83 new COVID-19 cases in Northeast Tennessee, according to numbers released Saturday by the Tennessee Department of Health. Here are the total cases by county as well as the change in cases:Hancock: 11Hawkins: 86, +3Sullivan: 210, +21Johnson: 46, +1…

articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.title: Doctors start seeing new coronavirus symptom patterns in young patients - BGR
articles.description: Coronavirus symptoms are no longer a mystery, but doctors dealing with the new surge in cases in some US states have noticed new patterns in patients. Younger patients are seeking medical help as more of them are being infected than before. Symptoms including…
